name: sumoselect
description: A jQuery plugin that progressively enhances an HTML Select Box into a Single/Multiple option dropdown list

scripts.release: shx cp src/jquery.sumoselect.js ./ && babel src -o jquery.sumoselect-ie.min.js && browserify jquery.sumoselect-ie.min.js | uglifyjs > jquery.sumoselect.min.js && rm jquery.sumoselect-ie.min.js && shx cp jquery.sumoselect.min.js docs/javascripts && git add docs/javascripts/jquery.sumoselect.min.js && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "chore: Update documentation" && standard-version

author: HemantNegi
